parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From ana and krino; properly, to scrutinize, i.e. investigate, interrogate, determine.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To will, intend, desire, wish. Middle voice of a primary verb; to 'will, ' i.e. be willing.
From apo and luo; to free fully, i.e. relieve, release, dismiss, or let die, pardon or divorce.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
To begin, am, exist, be in possession. From hupo and archomai; to begin under, i.e. Come into existence; expletively, to exist (verb).
From the same as aiteo; a cause, i.e. reason, crime.
Death, physical or spiritual. From thnesko; death.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
